text: The Perfect Couple (; aka The Best Romance) is a 2007 South Korean film. == Plot == While eating skewered tempura at a street vendor, young reporter Choi Soo-jin accidentally sticks the skewer into the side of a detective, Kang Jae- hyuk, who was chasing a suspected criminal. After this encounter, Soo-jin is told to work on a story about a detective, and the detective turns out to be Jae-hyuk. Soo-jin joins his crackdown on drug dealers, and the two start to fall in love. == Cast == * Lee Dong-wook ... Kang Jae-hyuk * Hyun Young ... Choi Soo-jin * Lee Jeong-heon * Jeon Soo-kyung * Jeong Jae-jin * Kim Jae-man * Kim Seung-min * Joo Seok-tae * Lee Myeong-jin * Jang Hyun-sung (cameo) == Release == The Perfect Couple was released in South Korea on 25 January 2007,"Box-Office Admission Results" (2007). Koreanfilm.org. Retrieved on 3 December 2008. and topped the box office on its opening weekend with 380,933 admissions."Korean Box Office" (2007.01.26 ~ 2007.01.28). HanCinema. Retrieved on 3 December 2008. It went on to receive a total of 1,299,274 admissions nationwide, with a gross (as of 18 March 2007) of $7,228,471."South Korea Box Office March 12–18, 2007". Box Office Mojo. Retrieved on 3 December 2008. == References == == External links == * http://thebest.showbox.co.kr/ * * Category:2007 films Category:Korean-language films Category:South Korean romantic comedy films Category:Showbox films Category:South Korean films
title: The Perfect Couple (2007 film)
